To Win

Leave your opponent with less than 3 men, or without any possibility to play his turn.

To Play

Each time you align 3 of your men, you can remove one of your opponent's men from the game.

X represents the number of pieces (=men) you start with.

There are two phases in the game:

  • placing the men: at each turn you put one men on an available position (=all intersections and corners)
  • moving men: this phase starts when all the men are on the board. At your turn move one men from its position to an adjacent available position.

Fly Variants

I you are playing one of the "fly" variants, you can move a men to any available position (not only adjacent ones) when you are reduced to 3 men.
